alert.note: Alert for Sheridan; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 4:40PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cherry and northeastern Sheridan Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 340 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rushville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gordon, Merriman, Clinton, Lone Butte, Irwin, Intersection of Highway 20 and Irwin Road, Shell Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Bayonne and Intersection of Highway 27 and Mills Road. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 95 and 144. Highway 61 between mile markers 222 and 231. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
